message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I know it would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $110.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and I am willing to pay up to $100 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to my original price. How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable paying $102 for it.
